summary: Core Valentine prompt behavior appears implemented (single-page App renders ValentinePrompt; evasive No via hover/pointer/touch handlers; Yes transitions to success view with meme image path and success message sourced from branding). However, the required static meme asset file itself is not shown as added/modified in the diff summary, and several unrelated deployment/metadata/debug features were introduced that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated meme image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact filename valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1200x800.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that the required image file was added under frontend/public/assets/generated/. The component references the path, but the asset itself is not present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an "App loaded" fixed-position indicator with version/build timestamp (debug/diagnostic UI).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly focuses on the Valentine prompt with only Yes/No actions and lists deployment UI troubleshooting as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Added public site URL configuration with URL validation/redirection helpers.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest requires a static frontend-only interaction and explicitly lists multi-page navigation and deployment troubleshooting as non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Runtime metadata synchronization (document title/canonical/Open Graph) utility.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for the Valentine interaction; introduces extra behavior beyond the specified single-page prompt flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Added no-cache meta headers in HTML.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and relates to deployment/caching concerns, which are outside scope per non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a deployment checklist document with troubleshooting steps and live URL.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and directly overlaps with the stated non-goal of troubleshooting the deployment UI/loading issue.
